amendment.description: To address the eligibility criteria for certain undocumented immigrant individuals with respect to certain health insurance plans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 705 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 705 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Menendez.
